name: Mister Bakso
description:
Mister Bakso is a simulation game about a Bakso (Indonesian Meatball) vendor who goes around the city selling baksos. You have a daily shift limit to sell as many bowls of baksos as you can. The more you sell, the higher your final score is.

Controls:
WASD - move
mouse - look
mouse 0 - use item/talk
e - exit gerobak
